title: Review Samsung Galaxy A8 Indonesia
description: Kita bahas nih Samsung Galaxy A8 yang keren punya, cek review dari kami biar kamu jelasss sblom beli ya.  Lihat juga review Galaxy A7 2016 dg RAM 3GB di https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GUmEnnV76UcSuka Teknologi? Ingat BeritaTeknologi.com! Say No to Gaptek! Kalau mau baca-baca review gadget silakan ke http://www.beritateknologi.com/seputar/reviewSpesifikasi Samsung Galaxy A8:Dimensi: 158 x 76,8 x 5,9 mmCPU: Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 octa core (dual cluster) quad core 1.8 GHz Cortex-A53 & quad core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A53 / Exynos 5430 octa core (dual cluster) quad core Cortex-A7 1.3 GHz & Cortex-A15 1.8 GHzMemori: 2 GB RAM + 32 GB ROM + slot micro SD up to 128 GBLayar: Super AMOLED 5,7 inci Full HD 1920x1080, Corning Gorilla Glass 4 Kamera: 16 MP,  autofocus, touch focus, face detection, panorama, HDR, LED flash + 5 MPJaringan: GSM, UMTS, 4G LTEKonektivitas: WiFi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 4.1, GPS/A-GPS, GLONASSBaterai: 3.050mAh non removableOS: Android 5.1 LollipopFB: BeritaTeknologi https://www.facebook.com/beritateknologiTwitter: @btekno https://twitter.com/bteknoGPlus: https://plus.google.com/+beritateknologiInstagram: https://instagram.com/berita.teknologiJangan lupa subscribe ke YouTube kami yah di http://www.youtube.com/beritateknologiBackground Music: Spektrem - Shine by NCS https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4tK7LYFxI0
